duties_responsibilities.duty: Registers patients, verifies insurance and general information, makes any necessary changes.
Schedules patient appointments for providers, performs canceling of appointment as needed.
Responsible for assisting the provider and other ancillary administrative staff with basic office medical functions to ensure a coordinated approach to patient activities.
Works closely with the provider to ensure expedient, appropriate patient care.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Graduate of approved program for Medical Assistant or 1 year of experience as a medical assistant.
1 year previous medical office/ reception experience. Certified Medical Assistant (preferred)
